title: Leaver Buster

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
i was recentely playing as {{champion:17}} and was trying to do the invis red {{summoner:11}}  steal for the first 5 min after i gave up i went to lane and died to a {{champion:36}} after about 10 min i got fed and started to destroy with my combo. the enemy was winning for the whole game till we brought it back for the win. After the game a message came up on my screen saying: you have been leaver busted for leaving a game for the next 5 match made games.

This is a bug

Pls help i even have a replay for proof

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you were penalised for being AFK for too long, ordinarily this wouldn't be a problem as a once off occurrence won't flag you for punishment.

However my guess would be that this has occurred regularly/you've left or afk'd in multiple games prior.
